Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other

English.Char_Desc_45: A very fast and reliable files copier.
English.Char_Desc_80: A very fast and reliable files copier.
English.Char_Desc_250: Copy Master is a very useful application that was designed in order to help you easily copy your files from one hard drive location to another, local or LAN / Wi-Fi, and even to USB memory devices as fast and reliable as possible.
English.Char_Desc_450:
Copy Master is a very useful application that was designed in order to help you easily copy your files from one hard drive location to another, local or LAN / Wi-Fi, and even to USB memory devices as fast and reliable as possible.
The program comes with a simple and user-friendly interface. More than that, all the necessary options are very easy to find and understand, in case you are a computer novice.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Copy Master easily allows you to copy files while showing progress percentages and how many files have been copied.
Copy Master is a very useful application that was designed in order to help you easily copy your files from one hard drive location to another, local or LAN / Wi-Fi, and even to USB memory devices as fast and reliable as possible.
The program comes with a simple and user-friendly interface. More than that, all the necessary options are very easy to find and understand, in case you are a computer novice.
Basically, the program will copy all the files found on your desired source location to any memory device connected to your computer, local or LAN / Wi-fi.
This application is completely and absolutely portable!
Features found in Copy Master:
- Cancellation of copy progress - Quickly copy a large number of files - Perfect for data backup or directory cloning - An option to over-write existing files if necessary - Copy files while showing progress percentages and amount of files that have been copied
No Java or .NET required, Green Energy Software.
